title: Out of battle: Wilfred Owen and Siegfried Sassoon
brief_description: Documentary: Brings to life some of the works of British First World War poets Wilfred Owen and Siegfried Sasson. Poems featured are “Dulce et decorum est”, “Anthem for doomed youth” and “The send off” by William Owen and “They” by Siegfried Sasson.
